name: Hook It!
description:
This prototype game was concepted and created in 7 weeks by a small and dedicated team of student devs at the School of Game Development @ Academy of Art University

“Move the Line, Fish the Prize!”

Sit on a boat and get ready to fish! Cast your line and puzzle your way through all the obstacles before the line runs out, then claim your prize of precious fish at the bottom of the sea!

Credits:

  • Shawn Liu / Game Designer, Scripter, Manager
  • Dan Li / Game Designer, Scripter
  • Ziggy Chen / Game Designer, Scripter
  • Beiqi Liu / 3D Artist, VFX
  • Instructor: Steven Goodale
  • Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
